title: Overall
stimulusHtml:
0–5 points

0 No scoring criteria met.

1 Accurately describes the subject matter of the work.

2 Accurately identifies the materials OR techniques that Ringgold used in the work.

3 Accurately explains how Ringgold’s use of these materials, techniques, OR subject matter is distinctive.

4 Accurately explains how Ringgold’s personal experience shaped her use of these materials, techniques, OR subject matter.

5 Accurately explains how one larger social concern of Ringgold’s time shaped her use of these materials, techniques, OR subject matter.
descriptions: Accurately describes the subject matter of the work.
Accurately identifies the materials OR techniques that Ringgold used in the work.
Accurately explains how Ringgold’s use of these materials, techniques, OR subject matter is distinctive.
Accurately explains how Ringgold’s personal experience shaped her use of these materials, techniques, OR subject matter.
Accurately explains how one larger social concern of Ringgold’s time shaped her use of these materials, techniques, OR subject matter.
